string.name: service_instructions
string.br: This is where you can start or stop this app\'s service. In order for this app to function correctly, I recommend allowing this service to run continuously. While the service is running, it does two things:
First, it listens for any new photos taken and saves a copy to eventually transfer(Photos awaiting transfer maybe viewed in this app\'s gallery).
Second, it keeps track of when this app will attempt to begin transferring the photos.

string.name: setup_instructions
string.br: Please fill out these fields before using this app.
IP ADDRESS - Enter the IP address of the computer that will be receiving the photos. I recommend assigning a static IP address to that computer.
PORT NUMBER - Enter the port number you will be using for the transfer. The number you pick must be the same as the one you choose for the computer receiving the photos.
